text: hageye adu, avara nantara bandavarigu (seride). ‘‘Nam'modeya, nam'mannu hagu namaginta munna visvasigalagidda nam'ma sahodararannu ksamisu. Visvasigala kuritu nam'ma manas'sugalalli yavude durbhavaneyannu belesabeda. Nam'modeya ninu tumba vatsalyamayi hagu karunaluvagiruve’’ endu avaru prarthisuttare
